pullrequest.title: Fix model selection after exiting model editor

content.raw:
I can't reproduce the issue as described, for me what happens on default is this:

1) Create model, Ctrl+X, Save and Exit

2) Model shows up on main window, not selected

3) Insert a cabinet, click on it, only the cabinet is highlighted

4) Click on the model created and both that and the cabinet become highlighted, even though I wasn't pressing Ctrl

I wasn't able to reproduce the crashing, and if I press Esc both models get deselected.

Nevertheless, this PR solves the unwanted multi-selection for me.
content.html:
I can't reproduce the issue as described, for me what happens on default is this:

1) Create model, Ctrl+X, Save and Exit

2) Model shows up on main window, not selected

3) Insert a cabinet, click on it, only the cabinet is highlighted

4) Click on the model created and both that and the cabinet become highlighted, even though I wasn't pressing Ctrl

I wasn't able to reproduce the crashing, and if I press Esc both models get deselected.

Nevertheless, this PR solves the unwanted multi-selection for me.
